results.title: Man and Donkey lever magic lantern slide
results.brief_description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a portrait of a man wearing a hat in a circular slide. An adjustable handle allows the viewer to move a beard.
results.description: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a portrait of a man wearing a hat in a circular slide. An adjustable handle allows the viewer to move a beard.
description_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide with wooden frame. The coloured slide shows a portrait of a man wearing a hat in a circular slide. An adjustable handle allows the viewer to move a beard.

details.label: Curatorial section
display_values: The Story of the Moving Image → Moving Pictures → MI-02. Play and Illusion → MI-02-C01 → Panel A2

results.title: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit glass slides (Reptiles)
results.credit_line: ACMI Collection. Donated by William Kerr on behalf of Edwin Schefferle.
results.brief_description: There are three parts to the Reptiles slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges. These slides form part of The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit with removable chimney and internal wooden block. The lantern is housed in original box with metal handle, and internal red and blue graphic for: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit. 20 glass slides in custom box, length of textile to keep box shut, 2 small empty boxes which act to store slides in a snug manner.

results.title: Being real about relationships
results.brief_description: In the second half of the Twentieth Century there have been developments in contraception. The film explains the rhythm, the calender, the temperature, the ovulation, the withdrawal, the barrier, the diaphragm, the condom, the IUD, the pill and the sterilisation methods.
results.description: In the second half of the Twentieth Century there have been developments in contraception. The film explains the rhythm, the calender, the temperature, the ovulation, the withdrawal, the barrier, the diaphragm, the condom, the IUD, the pill and the sterilisation methods.
description_for_label: In the second half of the Twentieth Century there have been developments in contraception. The film explains the rhythm, the calender, the temperature, the ovulation, the withdrawal, the barrier, the diaphragm, the condom, the IUD, the pill and the sterilisation methods.

display_values: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality → Contraception

results.title: Untitled Goose Game sketchbook: Stuart Gillespie-Cook
results.credit_line:
Gift of House House Pty Ltd.
Acquired via the National videogame collecting partnership between ACMI, the Powerhouse and the National Film and Sound Archive.
results.brief_description: A selection of drawings, sketches and notes from Stuart Gillespie-Cook’s sketchbook made while he was co-creating the videogame Untitled Goose Game with House House.
